study_plan_entry.title: Nanoscale MOSFETs and beyond CMOS devices

free_text.Learning outcomes: [li] Comprehension of ultimate limitations of silicon CMOS devices: physical and technological[br/][li] Understanding of the deep sub-micron (<70nm) innovative CMOS architectures and their limitations[br/][li] Understanding the operation and technology of silicon multi-gate and nanowire MOSFETs devices[br/][li] Apprehend the orthodox theory for few-electron devices: single electron transistor and single electron memory[br/][li] Understand the physics of small swing switches: IMOS, Tunnel FET, electro-mechanical transistors for low power[br/][li] Learn about the promise, opportunities and challenges of carbon electronics for beyond CMOS
free_text.Content: (1) Nanoscale CMOS technologies, technology boosters and potential showstoppers[br/][br/](2) Phenomena specific to deep submicron devices:[br/][li]non-stationary phenomena (velocity overshoot)[br/][li]ballistic transport[br/][li]quantum effects[br/][li]atomic scale parameter fluctuation (fluctuation of number of dopants, interface roughness)[br/][br/](3) Emerging multi-gate device architectures: Double-gate MOS transistor -DGMOS, nanowire gate-all-around transistor, vertical MOS transistors, 3D stacked multigate nanowire transistors[br/][br/](4) Single Electronics :[br/][li]Single Electron Transistor SET: orthodox theory, fabrication and modeling[br/][li]SET logic circuits[br/][li]Analog and metrology applications of SETs [br/][li]Single electron memories; principle and fabrication[br/][li]SET-CMOS hybrid devices and circuits[br/][br/](5) Beyond CMOS small swing switches for low standby power integrated circuits: impact ionization MOS, tunnel FETs, nano-electro-mechanical devices[br/][br/](6) Emerging non-volatile memories: phase change memory, spin based memories,  ferroelectric memory, polymer memory[br/][br/](7) Carbon electronics: carbon nanotubes and graphene transistors as new material options for high performance logic circuits.[br/]
free_text.Keywords: Nanoscale MOSFET, beyond CMOS device, single electronics[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic engineering courses in math, physics or material science[br/]
